All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AddItemsFrame
The AddItemsFrame class represents a graphical user interface frame for adding items to a vending machine.
BuyerWalletFrame
The BuyerWalletFrame class represents a graphical user interface frame that displays the wallet balance of a buyer.
CashBoxFrame
The CashBoxFrame class represents a graphical user interface frame that displays the contents of a cash box.

FileReaderWriter
 
InfoFrame
 
Item
The Item class represents an item with various attributes such as name, price, calories, weight, and damage status.
ItemSlot
The ItemSlot class represents a slot that holds a list of items.
MainMenuFrame
The MainMenuFrame class represents the main menu frame of the vending machine application.
MaintainanceFeaturesFrame
The MaintenanceFrame class represents a frame for maintaining a vending machine.
Model
The Model class represents the data model for the vending machine application.
Money
The Money class represents a monetary amount.
SpecialVendingMachine
The SpecialVendingMachine class represents a special type of vending machine that can create new items based on its ingredients.
TestFeaturesFrame
The TestFeaturesFrame class represents a frame for testing the features of the vending machine.
VendingMachine
The VendingMachine class represents a vending machine with item slots and a cash register.
vmFeaturesFrame
The vmFeaturesFrame class represents a JFrame for displaying the features of a vending machine.
